Contact and Maintenance Information
===================================

Questions and support
---------------------

.. _WebLion support (support@weblion.psu.edu): support@weblion.psu.edu
.. _#weblion: irc://irc.freenode.net/#weblion

Questions can be mailed to `WebLion support (support@weblion.psu.edu)`_
or asked in the
`#weblion`_ :abbr:`IRC (Internet Relay Chat)` channel on the Freenode network.


Report a bug
------------

Submit bugs to `WebLion support (support@weblion.psu.edu)`_.
